translations: adj.临界的；边界的；所属不清的；暧昧的
n.边界线，边界；中间地带；暧昧状态

phrs.translation: 边缘型人格；边缘性人格障碍

sentences.sentence: Boundary markers and borderlines are two different concepts.
sentences.translation: 界标和边界可是两个概念。

sentences.sentence: And where it seems that only borderlines, where others turn and sigh, you shall rise.
sentences.translation: 这里看起来只是边界，是其他人转身而去并叹息的地方，你应该站起来。

sentences.sentence: Article 48 the municipal and county (city) (bureau) competent authorities of construction shall define the borderlines of the roads already announced as the building lines.
sentences.translation: 第48条(建筑线)直辖市、县(市)(局)主管建筑机关，应指定已经公告道路之境界线为建筑线。
